articles.content: The National Aeronautics and Space Administration has a Halloween special for you: a compilation of elusive sounds of howling planets and whistling helium that the US agency says is sure to make your… [+1008 chars]

articles.title: Elon Musk releases blooper reel of failed SpaceX rocket landings and huge explosions - Hindustan Times
articles.description: Titled ‘how NOT to land an orbital rocket booster’, the video is described as showing “the sordid history of how the SpaceX Falcon 9, the first fully reusable, orbit-class booster rocket”.
articles.content:
SpaceX CEO Elon Musk has released video of bloopers that show his companys rockets exploding over land and sea.

articles.author: HT Correspondent
articles.title: Pink algae, spidery starfish: Robot gives rare glimpse under Antarctic sea ice - Hindustan Times
articles.description: While species like penguin, seals and whale often steal the show in the Antarctic, a robot has captured footage which reveals that underwater world beneath the ice capes is equally diverse and houses habitation full of myriad colours.
articles.content:
An underwater robot has captured a rare glimpse beneath the Antarctic sea ice, revealing a colourful world filled with coconut-shaped sponges, dandelion-like worms, pink algae and spidery starfish.
